name: cytomegalovirus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of virus that is not serious for most people but can kill or severely affect babies or people who do not have a strong immune system, such as people with HIV: They were infected with cytomegalovirus, a type of herpes. After cytomegalovirus infection you have to wait six months before donating blood again.
